thread.title: Cate Blanchett fabulously lip-synced Adele at a drag show
thread.title_full: Cate Blanchett fabulously lip-synced Adele at a drag show

author: USATODAY
title: Cate Blanchett fabulously lip-synced Adele at a drag show
text:
Cate Blanchett fabulously lip-synced Adele at a drag show Maeve McDermott , USATODAY Published 2:24 p.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 | Updated 1 hour ago 1 Shares 
(Photo: Rich Fury, AP) 
What a drag. 
Cate Blanchett took the stage at New York's Stonewall Inn on Monday night, showing off her lip-syncing skills for a benefit drag show supporting the Newtown Action Alliance . 
Blanchett donned a gold bra and pussy-eared beanie to provide background vocals for drag queen Margeaux Powell, who rocked the historic gay bar with a politically-charged take on Adele's Hello. A post shared by Stonewall (@thestonewallinn) on Feb 20, 2017 at 6:20pm PST 
Then, the actress took the stage solo to lip-sync her own take on Lesley Gore's You Don't Own Me , taking her performance into the audience while the crowd waved money in her direction. 
Blanchett, who is currently in New York filming Ocean's 8 and starring in The Present on Broadway, previously showed off her pussy hat at a December equality march. 
Blanchett at The Ghostlight Project rally in NYC. (Photo: Walter McBride, WireImage) Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lrYPtA Most Popular
